official_title: Open Pilot Trial of a Novel Mind-Body Sexual Well-Being Intervention for Female GI Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* Female sex
* English-speaking
* Aged 18 or older
* Receive any cancer care at MGH-CC sites (Boston, Waltham, Danvers, Newton Wellesley Hospital)
* Completed initial active treatment (i.e., surgery, radiation, chemotherapy) for colorectal or anal cancer approximately 3 months or more prior to enrollment OR diagnosed longer than 3 months ago if in metastatic cancer treatment.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Active psychiatric or cognitive comorbidity that prohibits the capacity to provide informed consent as determined by the study PI, a licensed psychologist, in collaboration with the patient's medical team
* Adults unable to complete study procedures in English.
* Participated in an earlier phase of the research study
